Package tp.pr4.control

Package containing the classes that control the execution of the game.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameTypeFactory
    Interface that collects together the construction methods of the different objects involved in a concrete game.
    Player
    Interface that represents a player; when the controller wants to know which move to execute next, it asks the player whose turn it is to provide a move.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComplicaFactory
    Implementation of the factory for Complica.
    Connect4Factory
    Implementation of the factory for Connect-4.
    ConsoleController
    Class which controls the execution of the game in a console mode, presenting the user with a set of alternatives and asking which he/she wishes to choose until the game finishes.
    Controller
    An abstract class for controller.
    GravityFactory
    Implementation of the factory for Gravity.
    RandomComplicaPlayer
    Player that randomly plays Complica.
    RandomConnect4Player
    Player that randomly plays Connect 4.
    RandomGravityPlayer
    Player that randomly plays Gravity.
    WindowControler
    Class which controls the execution of the game in a windows mode.

Package tp.pr4.control Description

Package containing the classes that control the execution of the game.
